title: Minimalist single-page bouquet hero with glassmorphism note overlay

requirements.text: Create a minimalist, responsive single-page layout with a solid #FAFAFA background and centered hero content that adapts well to mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports.

quotes:
Create a minimalist, responsive single-page website.
Background: A solid, clean #FAFAFA (off-white) background.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is centered both horizontally and vertically on common viewport sizes.
Layout remains usable and visually balanced on mobile widths (~375px) and large desktop widths (>=1440px).

requirements.text: Add a large, realistic photographic sunflower bouquet hero image centered on the screen, and apply a subtle CSS breathing animation that smoothly scales the image by approximately 1%‚Äì2% in a loop.

quotes: The Hero Image: Place a large, realistic photographic sunflower bouquet in the center of the screen. Add a very subtle CSS 'breathing' animation to the image so it scales slightly (1% to 2%) to make it feel premium.

acceptanceCriteria: A sunflower bouquet photo is displayed as the primary centered hero image.
The hero image uses a smooth looping scale animation between ~1.01 and ~1.02 (or equivalent subtle range) without jarring transitions.

requirements.text: Implement interaction so that clicking the bouquet image or clicking a small "Open Note" button opens a centered overlay note card above the bouquet.

quotes: When the user clicks the bouquet or a small 'Open Note' button, a minimalist card should appear centered over the bouquet.

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the bouquet opens the note card.
Clicking the "Open Note" button opens the note card.
When open, the note card is centered over the hero content.

requirements.text: Style the note card using minimalist glassmorphism: translucent frosted glass effect (backdrop-filter blur(10px)), thin semi-transparent white border, soft rounded corners, centered text, and generous line spacing. Use a clean modern sans-serif font (Inter or Montserrat).

quotes:
Style: The card should have a translucent, frosted glass effect (backdrop-filter: blur(10px)), a thin white semi-transparent border, and soft rounded corners.
Typography: Use a clean, modern sans-serif font like 'Inter' or 'Montserrat'. Use generous line-spacing and center-align the text.

acceptanceCriteria: Note card visually shows a frosted glass look via backdrop blur ~10px.
Card has a thin white semi-transparent border and rounded corners.
Text inside the card is center-aligned with generous line spacing.
App uses Inter or Montserrat as the primary sans-serif font (loaded via a web font or equivalent).

requirements.text: Display the provided note content exactly within the note card, and when the note is open, slightly blur the bouquet/background behind the card to keep focus on the message; ensure transitions feel fluid and elegant.

Vibe: The interaction should be fluid and elegant. When the note appears, the sunflowers should slightly blur in the background to keep the focus on the message.

acceptanceCriteria: The note card shows the message text exactly as provided (including punctuation, line breaks, and emojis).
When the note opens, the hero image/background behind it becomes slightly blurred.
Opening/closing the note uses smooth transitions (no abrupt popping).

requirements.text: Add the required generated hero image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the hero section.

quotes: Place a large, realistic photographic sunflower bouquet in the center of the screen.

acceptanceCriteria: A generated image file exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used by the hero image component.
The app loads the hero image without requiring any backend calls.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui) must not be modified.
nonGoals: No backend canister logic is required for this single-page note experience.
No multi-page routing, authentication, or persistent storage is included unless explicitly requested later.

required: Realistic photographic sunflower bouquet, centered composition, clean studio-like lighting, premium feel (sunflower-bouquet-hero.dim_1600x1600.png)
